column1: Eyes, ears, nose, mouth, and throat: - Blurred vision - Vision disturbances, including halos Gastrointestinal: - Diarrhea - Loss of appetite - Nausea - Stomach pain - Vomiting Heart and blood: - Irregular or slow heartbeat - Low blood pressure - Weakness Nervous system: - Confusion - Death - Depression - Disorientation - Dizziness - Drowsiness - Fainting - Headache - Lethargy Skin: - Hives - Rash Note: Depression, loss of appetite, and halos are usually only seen in chronic overdose cases.
